question: Express the angle at point A between Line_A_B and Line_C_A as a radian expression.
qt_description: Angle B-A-C by Line_A_B & Line_C_A at A (New edges: 1=False, 2=False) (Expr Length: 4)
description:

generated_question: In the given diagram, two circles intersect at points A and C. Circle centered at O1 passes through vertices A, B, and C of an equilateral triangle with side length 9. Circle centered at O2 is a translation of the first circle to the right, sharing chord AC. Lines AB and AC are drawn. Express the angle ∠BAC — formed at point A between segments AB and AC — as a radian expression.
